column4: hello all - i am running the beta version of ubuntu - can someone pls tell me how to upgrade to the actual 6.06 version when it comes out pls?
you will see it in updat manager when it comes out
so even though i'm up to date in the beta version i will still see it?
yeah you will also get the buf fixes as they are released
- i got a load of updates today and yesterday; will i still have more packages to update on june 1st?
SORRY - i had to blast that out :D
